skins.shipDescription: Sendai-class light cruiser number one ¨C Sendai.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Sendai, the first ship of the Sendai-class. Although my service record isn't as impressive as my little sisters', I served as the flagship of Destroyer Squadron 3 and fought in tons of battles. I bit the dust at Bougainville, but I did so as a warrior with no regrets.
skins.acquisition: You're a commander? I don't need one... But maybe we were fated to meet, or something. Guess you've got me to look after too, now. The name's Sendai. Don't forget it.
skins.login: I'm done warmin' up. Time to sortie, or what?
skins.details: These bandages? They're not for when I get hurt, they're for wrapping around my fists... You'll struggle to find anyone who can actually injure me.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I dream of justice, justice for... Never mind. Let's write off that one as a joke.
skins.secretaryIdle2: All I have are my principles and my fists. Even so, I'll always keep moving forward.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, who do you think is our worst enemy? The Sirens? I think it's our own minds.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you'll end up gettin' hurt if you approach me without warning.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You got a damn death wish? You askin' me to knock some sense into that skull of yours? Izzat it, huh?!

skins.shipDescription: Hmh. Guess I won't be needin' these bandages anymore. Commander, how about we find out how strong I've gotten... by having you take one of my punches?
skins.acquisition: Hmh. Guess I won't be needin' these bandages anymore. Commander, how about we find out how strong I've gotten... by having you take one of my punches?
skins.login: You're back, huh? Focus on your work. Gimme a shout when it's time to sortie.
skins.details: Yeah? Oh, I'm working on my sortie pose. When goin' to war, you need a war pose, y'know?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Violence is the only solution I know of for my problems. That's why I envy you and Jintsuu sometimes.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Whenever I try to be like Jintsuu and use logic to solve problems, I usually end up using my fists anyway. I dunno why, either...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hardships don't get under my skin, but I'm scared that I'll one day lose my way...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hold still, Commander. We're pals, so I'll only hit you with 80% of my full strength!
